text: I’m studying at Staffordshire university and I’m in year 2

Oh wow, that's so cool! Are you specialising in a medium? I know they do CG there right? Did you visit Manchester Animation Festival at all? I was there for the whole week - I actually work for the festival in my 'spare' time

I’m finding myself doing a lot of 2d animation which I enjoy but we do have software such as maya which we use for 3D animation. I didn’t unfortunately im still cramming in work for my deadline haha! ah wow that’s cool how was it this year ?
